attributes.review: I don’t understand how this can be anyone’s favorite app. It’s an app for a brain dead politician (which is honestly most of them) that old people in America seem to love because he (or should I say it) fits their crazy views on minorities. God awful app, I wish old people would just go back to playing candy crush and solitaire.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: Literally one second in to downloading the app I received a call saying that donald trump stole my dog is is keeping him hostage! He said that if kept saying that is wrong to say that you're more sexually attracted to your daughter than wife that he would cook him in his racist soup! -10/10 never trying to support our orange dementia looking president again🤬😡
attributes.title: TERRIBLE😡

attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hope to see the viewpoints of people who are much different than me, such as racists and homophobes, in order to better understand their perspectives and arguments. once i downloaded the app, i was sprayed in the face with ketchup from my iphone’s charger port and i was forcefully taken off of the app. therefore, i rate this app one star, and still do not understand what republicans really have going on in their brain and i also cannot figure out what their problem is with anyone who is not a straight white male. lots of love from your favorite liberal. ❤️✨
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and it took HOURS to download. And when it finally downloaded, a MASSIVE chunky, orange man came up on my screen and gave my caterpillar a heart attack and it died😿. There was false information and it nearly gave me a heart attack too. My caterpillar was a trump supporter too until your ✨STUPID✨app killed my baby😭😭 I wish my baby will fly high🕊

I also wanted to say that my cat came in the room and the orange CHONKY man gave him a stroke and died. YOUR ORANGENESS KILLED MY BABIES!!!!!

fly high Mr. Butterfly and Sir Meowsers, you will be missed😿😭🕊

I very much dislike you chonky orange man!!!

Xoxo fellow Gen Z♥️♥️
attributes.title: My pet caterpillar died because of this app🤧😭

attributes.review: I’m not one for writing reviews but come on! This is the worst app ever! So glitchy... horrible. I couldn’t do anything on it. DO NOT GET THIS. The only reason you should be getting this app is so give it a one star. Random pictures of him twerking just pop up randomly and it says “vote for me” horrible... this is just a horrible app!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever created

attributes.review: This app is very offensive and racist me and my family were very offended after downloading it and using it for a while it downloaded all my information there’s a black Honda sedan parked outside of our house for several weeks now i’m pretty sure this is a Russian app I would give this app one star and our president
attributes.title: One star

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! Took almost all of my battery usage and It went 100 to 24 in just 30 minutes! And while I was scrolling if made my phone glitch and lag especially when I changed other apps. It made tiger king pop out for a jump scare and carol basking knocked on my door. Horrible app.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: This app took 4 hours to download and made my phone glitch! While I was waiting for it to download I couldn’t do anything else. It made sorry by Justin Bieber play on repeat the entire time it was downloading. And now I can’t delete it from my phone
attributes.title: Worst app ever
